name: @dolphjs/cli
description: The dolphjs-cli is a tool for efficient intialization and management of a dolphjs project
author: <utibeabasiekong2@gmail.com>

scripts.rm:test: rm -r controllers/user/ && rm -r services/user && rm -r routes/user && rm -r models/user && rm -r configs/user
scripts.build: tsc ./src/index.ts --esModuleInterop true --target ES2020 --module nodenext --moduleResolution nodenext --outDir dist
scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run build  && node ./dist/index.js
scripts.pub: npm run clean && npm run build
